definition: sand content/quantity of sediment (carried by a river)
to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The river is yellow because of high content of sand in the water.
sentences.chinese: 黃河水因高含沙量而成黃色。

sentences.english: The current velocity decreased and the suspended sediment concentration increased from the surf zone to the near shore.
sentences.chinese: 由破波帶向岸方向，流速逐漸減小，含沙量逐漸增加。

sentences.english: It is the most sandiness river in the world.
sentences.chinese: 它是世界上含沙量最多的河流。

sentences.english: The ratio between turbidity and the concentration of high-turbidity water of the Huanghe River is not constant.
sentences.chinese: 黃河水的濁度與含沙量之間沒有固定的比值關係。

sentences.english: China’s Huang He (Yellow River) is the most sediment-filled river on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 中國黃河是世界上含沙量最大的河流。

definition: quantity of sand (transported by a river)/sediment content
inward flowing river/river flowing into desert or salt lake, e.g. Tarim river 塔里木河
